description: You're gonna love watching these two go at it as Jake opens up and lets a guy suck his cock for the first time. This is classic 'crossin' the line' action. Jake is the epitome of the straight, tough alpha male and by the time it's all over, watching him use Blake as his little bitchboy cocksucker is going to blow your mind and make you wish like hell you were Blake. When I first met Jake I couldn't wait to get him into some kind -- any kind -- of action with another guy. It took some serious work on my part, but I finally pulled it off and this scene alone is worth the price of the Alpha Tango DVD, but throw in the scene with Dorian, Austin and Shawn and this DVD is a steal.
title: Blake & Jake
